subject: A basic Question about JUnit Installation
msgSnippet: Hi I run the java junit.textui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests in the command line after set the CLASSPATH to the junit.jar,but it tells me : Can not find
messageBody:
Hi
I run the "java junit.textui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests" in
the command line after set the CLASSPATH to the junit.jar,but it
tells me :"Can not find the class of junit.samples.AllTests" ,What is
wrong with my operation?

And I'd like to run the samples in the installation directory such as
simpletest, and specify the CLASSFILE to that simpletest.class and
run "java junit.textui.TestRunner simpletest" it still tells me
that :"Can not find the class of simpletest" What is wrong with
that ?

Thanks!
